content: Is it possible for a realm to have multiple names ?
aka, I can access it both by domain1.com and domain2.com ?
Not really. Zulip wants to have one canonical URL. You can have domain2.com be a redirect to domain1.com.
do you know what the realm_domains command does in manage.py ?
That's specifically for which email address domains are allowed to log in. We should update the documentation to clarify that.
I think actually we should just remove that management command? It was the original UI for this feature, but we're pretty happy with the settings UI for it that's been around for years.
Yeah, :+1: to that.
